about_the_game:
Your high school years are over, and now it’s time to think about the future. You need to pick a good college, find yourself a girlfriend, and start thinking about a job. That’s when your life changes; you’re diagnosed with a mysterious illness and there’s only one way to cure it.

You’re going to need some help from others to beat this disease. Specifically from the women around you, so you better bring your A game. Not every woman will easily fall for your charm, you’re going to have to work for it. Only then can you hope to cure yourself of this disease.

Will you find a way to seduce all of the women? Will you fulfil their wishes, and maybe a little more…?

Well, what are you still waiting for? Go meet all these lovely ladies and make their wish, and yours, come true.

Features:
• Over 3500 images
• More than 300 animations
• 10 lovely ladies to interact with
• Several minigames
• Stats management (completely optional)
• Cheats for easier playthrough

content_descriptors.notes: This game explicitly depicts sex scenes and violence. The game is not intended for easily offended players. All in-game characters are over 18 years old.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.4 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: My Cute Roommate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Your high school years are over, and now it’s time to think about the future. You need to pick a good college, find yourself a girlfriend, and start thinking about a job. That’s when your life changes; you’re diagnosed with a mysterious illness and there’s only one way to cure it.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Russian
